backend/main.mo: Defines main actor with storage, authorization, website config, shop data structures, and user profile/payment handling APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing components, pages, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router, query client, theming, dynamic titles, and lazy-loaded pages within the app layout.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutModal.ts: Modal for checkout flow handling username input, QR code UPI payment generation, and payment completion.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, caffeine.ai link, and UPI payment notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Full header component with navigation, auth handling, cart count, and dynamic logo from config.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps page layout with header, footer, background config, and triggers profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name and Minecraft username, including validation and save mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor tied to identity, auto-invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useNaturalScroll.ts: Implements natural and touch-accelerated scrolling while skipping form and scrollable elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin status, profiles, shop items, UPI config, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for theming, base styles, and custom utility classes including glow effects and reducedâ€‘motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements an admin panel for editing website configuration including logo, background, and other appearance settings.
frontend/src/pages/DiscordPage.tsx: Displays a Discord invite page that loads the invite link from website config and shows a join button.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows a user's purchase history with timestamps, item details, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, server status, configurable tagline, and voting links.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and button linking back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Provides the shop interface for browsing items, managing the cart, and initiating purchases via UPI.
frontend/src/pages/VotePage.tsx: Renders a vote page that loads vote site URLs from config or defaults and displays them with links and loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/websiteAppearance.ts: Utilities for resolving logo URLs, generating background styles, and validating image URLs and hex colors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme with custom fonts, colors, animations, shadows, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state describing issues with mo:core imports and listing feature requests to rewrite backend using mo:base only.
